alert.note: Alert for Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 9:06PM MST until January 03 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST TUESDAY FOR ELEVATIONS ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Periods snow redeveloping above 5000 feet after Midnight MST tonight. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches above 5000 feet and 3 to 8 inches above 6000 feet. * WHERE...Areas above 5000 feet near Grand Canyon, Jacob Lake, North Rim, Payson and Pine-Strawberry. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions will impact the Tuesday morning commute. Snow forecast from 11 PM Today to 5 PM Tuesday: Grand Canyon 2 to 4 inches Jacob Lake 3 to 5 inches North Rim 4 to 6 inches Payson 2 to 4 inches Pine-Strawberry 3 to 5 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Northern Gila County
